name: Portal Vein Thrombosis with Cavernous Transformation
chief_complaint: I've had this dull pain in my upper right belly for weeks and my skin looks yellow
prognosis: Variable depending on underlying cause; can lead to portal hypertension complications if untreated
description: A condition where thrombus forms in the portal vein, leading to development of collateral veins (cavernous transformation) as alternative drainage pathways. Often secondary to cirrhosis, malignancy, or hypercoagulable states.
